title: Pixel XL 128GB rebooting even after factory reset
content:
My Google Pixel XL 128GB was working fine... I was making a film and suddenly the phone rebooted and start in a bootloop... After that night, it does not keep more than 5 mins without a restart.

I tried to factory reset it and after each factory reset, the phone comes back (boot properly). But for a short period.

I tested in safe mode and the reboot is still happening... It looks that the safe mode does not do any difference in my issue.

I already did a downgrade of Android even with Android 8 (I was with Android 10). I tried several versions in https://developers.google.com/android/images

I am from Brazil and I am really worried. Can anyone help me?
